radiographic_examinations.findings: Moderately severe subcortical white matter disease.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Striking increase in both gray and white matter lesion volumes; total brain volume remained relatively constant.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Initial white matter lesion volume: 15.50 ml, gray matter lesion volume: 1.54 ml, total brain volume: 1352.85 ml. Follow-up white matter lesion volume: 37.89 ml, gray matter lesion volume: 2.35 ml, total brain volume: 1333.53 ml.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increase in white matter lesion volume by 22.39 ml, gray matter lesion volume by 0.81 ml, and decrease in total brain volume by 19.32 ml.
